name: ent-kaur-16-en-19-oate,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: ent-7alpha-Hydroxykaur-16-en-19-oic acid + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Gibberellin A12 aldehyde + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
comment: the second step of three-step reaction (see R10067, R06294+R06295+R06297)
